title: FS: T206 Bastian SLer PSA 2  $68 - SOLD
author: Anthony S.

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Bastian SLer PSA 2  $68 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Card has paste residue on the back and two wrinkle/creases above and to the left of his head on the front (the 3rd photo does the best job of elucidating these).  Kind of a sinister looking guy.  $68 delivered -- SOLD

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
